description:
Hibari makes his appearance by breaking through the walls to the box weapons lab! The strongest Guardian, and the man reputed to be the strongest swordsman of this era have finally come face to face. Hibari asks the location of the white device. Ignoring the question, the Phantom Knight open his box and unleashes an illusionary sea of trees. The illusion covers up Lal Mirch and Yamamoto, who has been defeated. Learning that his opponent uses illusion, Hibari switches his ring and states to the enemy – “I hate spellcasters… I feel like making them grovel to the floor”. The battle between the strongest vs. strongest has begun...!
Source: crunchyroll
